alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:33PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake County through 1100 PM EDT... At 1033 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Eustis. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eustis, Tavares, Mount Dora, Lisbon and Mid Florida Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
